Description: Blue glazed composition shabti; single row and column of Hieroglyphic text. Owner is Nesbanebdjed, born to Shentyt.
Curator's comments: Similar example in Leiden, published: HD Schneider, Shabtis (Leiden 1977), II, 184-5, III, pl. 61 (with list of examples in other museums and collections). Two specimens in Frank H McClung Museum, University of Tennessee, Knoxville (see correspondence J H Taylor and Jefferson Chapman, 2012).
